34
DEPRIVATION OF THE STATUTORY PORTION AND TAKING INTO ACCOUNT TESTAMENTARY DISPOSITIONS AND GIFTS
(1) If the heir is deprived of his or her full statutory portion, testamentary dispositions shall be reduced and gifts returned, as much as is necessary to complement the statutory portion.
(2) An heir shall be deprived of his or her full statutory portion when the total value of the testamentary dispositions and gifts surpasses the disposable portion of the estate.
(3) In establishing the total value of the testamentary dispositions and gifts, those gifts and testamentary dispositions that the decedent determined were not to be included in a particular forced heir's hereditary portion shall also be taken into account.
(4) Out of the gifts and testamentary dispositions that are included in a forced heir's hereditary portion, only those that exceed that particular heir's statutory portion shall be taken into account in establishing the total value of the testamentary dispositions.
